== Olavanna (CT) (627432) ==

Olavanna (CT) is a town in the [[Kozhikode]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 11.32 sq. km. and harbouring 9482 households with total population of 43895 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 8 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 410 km. Male population is 21489 and female population is 22406. Scheduled Caste population is 1591 and Scheduled Tribes population is 121. Census Location Code of the town is 627432<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 8 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 8 km. Railway station is at Kozhikode at a distance of 8 km.
